page.title: 18Forestry
page.content:
Besides producing timber commercially another important aim of the Forestry Commission is to provide facilities for holidaymakers and day visitors, who with the aid of maps bought in the campsite shop can enjoy {walks}of various lengths around the area. These are clearly marked by posts with coloured rings, and there are{parking places}and{picnic tables conveniently situated. Permanent control points for{orienteering courses have recently been placed in the woods too.
Other activities which are encouraged include{horse riding, bird {watching}and{fishing.
Once a year in November the{R.A.C. {Motor Rally}passes through special stages in the forest.
